pcadapt
  • Overview
  • Documentation
  • Articles

File Converter

read.pcadapt converts genotype matrices or files to an appropriate format readable by pcadapt. You may find the converted file in the current directory.

read.pcadapt(input, type, local.env, ploidy, pop.sizes = NULL,
  allele.sep = c("/", "|"), blocksize)

Arguments

input

a genotype matrix or a character string specifying the name of the file to be converted.

type

a character string specifying the type of data to be converted to the pcadapt format. Supported formats are: ped, vcf, lfmm.

local.env

deprecated argument.

ploidy

an integer specifying the ploidy of the individuals.

pop.sizes

a vector specifying the number of individuals to be sampled for each pool.

allele.sep

a vector of characters indicating what delimiters are used in VCF files. By default, only "|" and "/" are recognized.

blocksize

deprecated argument.

Contents

  • Arguments
